actions.text: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham, M. amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A067) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham, M..
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham, M. amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A067) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham, M..

description: An amendment numbered 73 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding for Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFIs) by $5 million and decreases the General Services Administration Federal Buildings Fund by a similar amount.
purpose: An amendment numbered 73 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding for Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFIs) by $5 million and decreases the General Services Administration Federal Buildings Fund by a similar amount.
